data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, kùla nu ɲɔiti zea,
Ta-ɠisiɛi ɠa ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛɛ vai nɔ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, màkɛ, gè mina lɔ nu ɲɔiti zeezu.
Waso nuiti ti baliiti daa kɔ̀ɠɔ wu,
Gè ɠɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma: «Ɗa ga nà-GALAGI!»
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Màliɠii, ɗa ga nà-zobogi, ta nà-kizogi,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, mina va naa wu, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti bɛ, nii wɔin ti ma!
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nɛgiti ti ɠula eteai ʋa!
Gè suɠwɛɛ ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa telebodai ɠɛ bala nuiti bɛ,
Naazu, telebo nuiti ta è-laaseigi maamusɛ wuyeiti too.
